updates.log:
- Major overhaul to commands
- Fixed the disconnecting issue after 2 minutes of the bot joining.
- Improved and fixed the error handler
- Revamped the ``/botinfo`` command
- Resolved auto-deafen issue for the bot
- Enhanced the ``/join`` command
- Updated the wiki to be in the updated format

Added:
- ``/report`` command for users to report issues with the bot if there are any.

Other Changes:
- Removed Turkey radio stations temporarily due to a bug that caused the bot to crash when playing a station from there. These stations will be added back later.
- Redid and added content to the help command.
- Reworked the radio command for better optimization and functionality.
- Currently working on a new command, ``/verify``, which requires users to join the support server and execute the command. This grants access to additional features in the bot and alpha commands that are not yet available to the public. Remaining in the server is necessary to maintain verified status and access to the associated benefits.

Added:
- ``/volume`` command is back and working!
- Added more radio stations for Africa
- Reworked ``/suggestions`` command
- Some other stuff have been redone for the bot for better listening!

Major rehaul to the ``/radio`` command (Expect Bugs, please report them to ``Person0z``:

- Improved station sorting for better user experience.
- Corrected handling of thumbnail URLs.
- Optimized URL retrieval for selected radio station action.
- Updated stream link URLs for enhanced reliability and performance.

- Worked on some errors that popped up.
- optimized the bot a bit more, and added a few more radio stations.
- Fixed the bot volume having been very loud when in VC, it has been reduced and made quieter, speaking of that the ``/volume`` command has been removed temporarily while i work on a fix to implement to new volume limit.

Change log
- Optimized Code and doing further optimizing.
- Added a auto leave after 60 seconds so the bot wont use up resources and play music if no one is a VC
- Worked on a ``/join`` command and a ``/disconnect`` command
- Added a few more things to the ``/botinfo`` command (swap usage)

- **HOTFIX**: Quick hotfix for the auto disconnect as it was disconnecting when people were in the vc still. Has been fixed and reworked.

Change Log:
- Added ``/play link:`` which allows the user to play there own custom stream links on voice channels. Must be supported and will not support youtube links at all.
- Added Turkey radio stations, more are comming soon so watch out for that!
- Added ``/links`` command to see bot links and dev links

Change Log:
- Reworked bot profile /+ status.
- Redid owner checks for commands
- Made commands hidden and only for me (still in the works) so you guys can't use/see somethings

Added:
- A ``/wiki`` command to explain how to use the bot and other important info that you and other people would benifit from knowing.

Added:
- Blacklisting function to blacklist users from using the bot if they abuse it in any way shape or form. I really hope i wont have to use this feature on anyone.
- Optimized commands and code, and some other stuff.

Added
- PH Radio Stations, ``/radio region:ph action:station``
- Added cooldown on some commands for the radio to reduce stress on the bot when users spam it.
- Made the command cooldown embed and made it look nice
- Made the ``/radio`` command better with full country names instead of the 2 letters.

Added:
- More radio stations 
- Command cooldowns 
- Updated some links for stations 
- Fixed volume control issues with negitive volume. 
- Added a ``/mute`` command which allows the bot to be quickly muted and unmuted!

Added:
- ``/update version:`` You can now check in any server what updates happened in the past or just been worked and added in the bot.

Added:
- Russian Radio Stations
- African Radio Stations

Fixed:
- Fixed suggestions bot
- Changed radio station links to radio garden (reason being that the bot was in violation of TOS for iHeart. Now that we are using radio garden we are Gucci)

Upcoming:
- More stations
- Optimization for the bot
- Weekly updates
